    26-August-2022

    New Docs

    • Product: Beacon
    • Product Area: Monetization

    • Title: Ingesting WebVTT Files
    • Description: Added note that for 608 embedded close captions, only Latin characters are supported.

    • Product: Video Cloud
    • Product Area: Dynamic Ingest/Captions
    • Title: Live API: Creating VOD Clips
    • Description: Added note VOD clips must use non-CAE profiles, so either the account default profile must be non-CAE or a non-CAE profile must be specified in the request.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/guides/live-api-creating-vod-clips.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Live API / VOD clips
    • Title: Live API: VOD from Live Event
    • Description: Added note VOD from Live must use non-CAE profiles, so either the account default profile must be non-CAE or a non-CAE profile must be specified in the request.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/guides/live-api-vod-live-event.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Live API / VOD from Live
    • Title: Creating a Video Clip Using the Live Module
    • Description: Added note clip from Live must use non-CAE profiles, so the account default profile must be non-CAE.
    • Link: https://studio.support.brightcove.com/live/live-module/creating-video-clip-using-live-module.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Live Module / Clipping
    • Title: Live API Reference
    • Description: Added note that updates to a Live Event made in the Live Module are not reflected in the live job metadata returned by the API.
    • Link: https://apis.support.brightcove.com/live-api/references/reference.html
    • Product: Live
    • Product Area: Live API / Live job metadata
